lyric:
[00:00.0]
[00:05.1]Astro-naut
[00:06.3]
[00:13.94]What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[00:17.94]When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[00:21.9]When these people talk too much, put that shit in slow motion, yeah
[00:24.76]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean, ayy
[00:27.92]What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[00:30.65]When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[00:33.93]When these people talk too much, put that shit in slow motion, yeah
[00:37.51]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean
[00:39.94]
[00:40.22]She say that I'm cool (Damn straight)
[00:42.1]I'm like "Yeah, that's true" (That's true)
[00:43.43]I believe in G-O-D (Ayy)
[00:45.8]Don't believe in T-H-O-T
[00:46.77]She keep playing me dumb (Play me)
[00:48.18]I'ma play her for fun (Uh-huh)
[00:50.1]Y'all don't really know my mental
[00:51.44]Let me give you the picture like stencil
[00:52.84]Fallin' out in a drought
[00:54.2]No flow, rain wasn't pourin' down (Pourin' down)
[00:55.87]See, that pain was all around
[00:57.35]See, my mode was kinda lounged
[00:59.6]Didn't know which, which way to turn
[01:00.67]Flow was cool but I still felt burnt
[01:02.13]Energy up, you can feel my surge
[01:03.79]I'ma kill everything like this purge (Ayy)
[01:04.80]
[01:05.36]Let's just get this straight for a second, I'ma work (Yuh)
[01:09.19]Even if I don't get paid for progression, I'ma get it (Uh, get it)
[01:12.16]Everything that I do is electric (Ayy)
[01:15.14]I'ma keep it in a motion, keep it movin' like kinetic, ayy (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[01:16.56]
[01:18.24]Put this shit in a frame, better know I don't blame
[01:20.14]Everything that I say, man, I seen you deflate
[01:21.83]Let me elevate, this ain't a prank
[01:23.21]Have you walkin' on a plank, la-la-la-la, like
[01:24.81]Both hands together, God, let me pray (Now let me pray), uh
[01:27.97]I've been goin' right, right around, call that relay (Masked Wolf)
[01:31.25]Pass the baton, back and I'm on
[01:32.70]Swimmin' in the pool—Kendrick Lamar, uh (Ayy)
[01:34.17]Want a piece of this, a piece of mine, my peace a sign
[01:35.53]Can you please read between the lines?
[01:37.60]My rhyme's inclined to break your spine (Spine)
[01:38.95]They say that I'm so fine (Fine)
[01:40.91]You could never match my grind (True)
[01:42.31]Please do not, not waste my time (Wolf)
[01:43.34]
[01:43.82]What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[01:47.54]When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[01:50.46]When these people talk too much, put that shit in slow motion, yeah
[01:54.33]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean, ayy
[01:57.52]What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[02:00.20]When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[02:03.48]When these people talk too much, put that shit in slow motion, yeah
[02:07.41]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean
tlyric:
[by:盲光不冠6周倒立洗头]
[00:00.0]
[Intro]
[Chorus]
[Verse 1]
[Bridge]
[Verse 2]
[Chorus]
[00:05.1]宇航-员
[00:06.3]
[00:13.94]你对情感交织有什么理解？
[00:17.94]当你头脑麻木——亦可被称作精神冻结。
[00:21.9]当别人说个不停，就把它慢速播放。
[00:24.76]我感觉像个深海里的宇航员。
[00:27.92]你对情感交织有什么理解？
[00:30.65]当你头脑麻木——亦可被称作精神冻结。
[00:33.93]当别人说个不停，就把它慢速播放。
[00:37.51]我感觉像个深海里的宇航员。
[00:39.94]
[00:40.22]她说我很酷。
[00:42.1]我说：“确实如此”。
[00:43.43]我相信上帝，
[00:45.8]不相信女人。
[00:46.77]她玩弄我像傻子，
[00:48.18]我要好好玩玩她。
[00:50.1]你不知道我的心理。
[00:51.44]我来给你构建一下这个画面。
[00:52.84]大吵一架，情感冷漠。
[00:54.2]没有气流，雨滴不会掉落（另：不发歌就赚不到钱）
[00:55.87]看吧，痛苦无处不在。
[00:57.35]看吧，我的状态有些懒。
[00:59.6]不知道该走哪条路。
[01:00.67]气流凉爽，可我仍觉灼热（另：说唱高超，但我仍感焦虑）
[01:02.13]精力充沛，你感觉到了我的激情。
[01:03.79]我要毁灭一切，就像一场清洗。
[01:04.80]
[01:05.36]我们先把话说明白，我要工作了。
[01:09.19]我也要继续，即使进步不会带来回报。
[01:12.16]我所做的一切都令人惊讶。
[01:15.14]我会保持内心驱动力，持续前行。
[01:16.56]
[01:18.24]把这东西好好珍藏，我不会怪谁。
[01:20.14]我说的每一句话，都可见地让你泄气。
[01:21.83]让我来振作你，这可不是恶作剧。
[01:23.21]你曾否遭遇甲板漫步的酷刑。
[01:24.81]双手合十，上帝啊我要祈祷。
[01:27.97]我总是转来转去，这叫接力赛。
[01:31.25]传过接力棒，我又回来了。
[01:32.70]在游泳池里游泳，就像喇嘛（《Swimming Pools》）。
[01:34.17]是否想尝尝这滋味，尝尝漂亮女孩，尝尝面粉。
[01:35.53]麻烦您看看我歌词的意思，
[01:37.60]我的押韵会让你五体投地。
[01:38.95]他们说我好厉害！
[01:40.91]你永远也无法企及。
[01:42.31]请不要浪费我宝贵的时间了。
[01:43.34]
[01:43.82]你对情感交织有什么理解？
[01:47.54]当你头脑麻木——亦可被称作精神冻结。
[01:50.46]当别人说个不停，我就左右手一个慢动作。
[01:54.33]我感觉像个深海里的宇航员。
[01:57.52]你对情感交织有什么理解？
[02:00.20]当你头脑麻木——亦可被称作精神冻结。
[02:03.48]当别人说个不停，我就把这玩意慢放。
[02:07.41]我感觉像个深海里的宇航员。
